comments.body:
I'm not understanding this test. The controllers "own" resources based off naming schemes. With the name "Bad Name", the controller will never do anything with it. 

Same with BackendService below.

Changed to the expected name - this test expects the helper function `clearPreviousInternalResources` to be called, which deletes the existing ForwardingRule, Firewall, etc if other attributes are incorrect or missing.
